metadata.title: RH850/F1x: How do I register for a MyRenesas account so that I can download user’s guides and other technical documents and software for all Renesas MCU products?

sections.content:
Question:
How do I register for a MyRenesas account so that I can download user’s guides and other technical documents and software for all Renesas MCU products?
Answer:
Go to https://www.renesas.com/us/en/gur/ssoRegisterUser.do and fill out the form. Once you’ve created a user id and password, you will be able to log in to download user’s guides.
Suitable Products
RH850/F1x
